title: Fundamentals of Thermophotovoltaic Energy Conversion
description:
Donald Chubb, "Fundamentals of Thermophotovoltaic Energy Conversion"
English | ISBN: 0444527214 | 2007 | PDF | 530 pages | 3,06 mb

This is a text book presenting the fundamentals of thermophotovoltaic(TPV) energy conversion suitable for an upper undergraduate or first year graduate course. In addition it can serve as a reference or design aid for engineers developing.

First text written on thermophotovoltaic(TPV) energy conversion
